name: Shadow Hunter
description: Shadow Hunter is a casual deductive puzzle game with RPG elements. Explore areas filled with turn-based random encounters and events, veiled under horror filled darkness. With your food supply running low, and wit and a little luck your only tools... tread carefully as every step can be your last.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8 Processor: 2.0 Ghz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB Video RAM Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Ensure you have all the latest drivers

reviews.review_text: Super simple game. It may seem like a poor way to sum it up but I feel I have to do it. This game is basically fantasy Minesweeper. Whether you will like that or not, I sure dont know, its free though so if that seems interesting give it a try.

It is a fun time wasting game which is more about the puzzle than the RPG part but I have to admit that it needs to have more enmies to battle and the game has to have more than only one character and there should be a story for the game to add the excitment in the game
not bad I guess, but it belongs in a browser.

Hi This is easy game after you get the idea. The idea is same trough the whole game. I am not sure if there is any way to purchase or get more stones etc because they run out if playing long enough. And there should also be an other way to mark shadows when you can be 100 % sure that there is one.
